General.Name: ShenZhen V&T Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen V&T Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of medium and low voltage inverters, electric vehicle motor controllers, servo drives, inverters, and other power electronic products in China and internationally. Its products are used in lifting, machine tools, air compressors, elevators, printing and packaging, metallurgy, petroleum, chemical, water supply, air conditioning, municipal engineering, and mining, and other industries. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
